task.title: Install on Linux
task.shortdesc: The installation links are provided on the website.

taskbody.context: Follow these simple steps to install OBS Studio on Linux.

step.cmd: Click the link to install OBS Studio on Linux. https://obsproject.com/kb/linux-installation

step.stepresult: The download gets started. Once the download is complete, an on-screen message is displayed: Thank you for Downloading OBS Studio!
